author: The Astrotwins
title: Leo Daily Horoscope
text: Advertisement - Continue Reading Below February 22, 2017 Bring on the relationship rescue remedy! Today's healing trine between communication planet Mercury and high-minded Jupiter helps you release a longstanding grudge and repair an important tie. Initiate a productive dialogue and discuss the ways in which you work well together, instead of pointing fingers and placing blame. While it's fine to be honest about any wrongdoings, sandwich criticism with positive feedback. That way, people won't feel like they're under attack. More from ELLE:
